sso_only_title: Log In or Sign Up Instantly using Social Authentication
sso_only_body: To keep the forum safe and secure, and to keep out trolls and other undesireables we ask everyone to sign up or sign in with one of the methods below. We use the authentication information from these services to log you in and set your basic profile information. We don't share any of that information with anyone, we never have access to your service's password and we never store or share any extra data from the services.
